sql.if: JOIN user u1 ON a1.author_id = u1.id AND u1.id = #{authorId}
JOIN category c1 ON a1.category_id = c1.id AND c1.slug = #{categorySlug}
JOIN article_tag at1 ON a1.id = at1.article JOIN tag t1 ON at1.tag = t1.id AND t1.slug = #{tagSlug}

mapper.sql: SELECT a1.id FROM article a1 WHERE a1.delete_flag = '0' ORDER BY a1.modify_time DESC LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(a1.id) FROM article a1 WHERE a1.delete_flag = '0';

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.excerpt, a.create_time, a.modify_time, u.id AS user_id, u.username AS user_username, u.realname AS user_realname, c.id AS category_id, c.slug AS category_slug, c.name AS category_name, t.id AS tag_id, t.slug AS tag_slug, t.name AS tag_name FROM () sub JOIN article a ON sub.id = a.id LEFT JOIN category c ON a.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN user u ON a.author_id = u.id LEFT JOIN article_tag at ON a.id = at.article LEFT JOIN tag t ON at.tag = t.id;

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.excerpt, a.create_time, a.modify_time, u.id AS user_id, u.username AS user_username, u.realname AS user_realname, c.id AS category_id, c.slug AS category_slug, c.name AS category_name, t.id AS tag_id, t.slug AS tag_slug, t.name AS tag_name FROM article a LEFT JOIN category c ON a.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN user u ON a.author_id = u.id LEFT JOIN article_tag at ON a.id = at.article LEFT JOIN tag t ON at.tag = t.id WHERE a.delete_flag = '0' AND a.id = #{id}
SELECT id, title, excerpt, author_id, category_id, create_time, modify_time FROM article WHERE delete_flag = '0' AND id = #{id} FOR UPDATE
